messages.paymentCanceled: Payment was canceled. If you have any questions, please contact our support team.
messages.alreadyMember: You are already a member and can access all course content.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and other popular payment methods through our secure payment processor Stripe.

questions.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
questions.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. Your access will continue until the end of your current billing period.

questions.question: Is there a refund policy?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer a 7-day money-back guarantee if you're not satisfied with our service.

questions.question: What's included in the Pro plan?
questions.answer: The Pro plan includes all basic features plus advanced tutorials, interview preparation materials, and premium solutions with detailed explanations.

questions.question: How do I access the content after purchase?
questions.answer: After purchase, you'll have immediate access to all content included in your plan. Simply log in to your account to start learning.
